DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate antibody response influenza vaccine ( AdimFlu-S ) , measure hemagglutination inhibition ( HAI ) 4 week post immunization pregnant woman compliance requirement current European Union ( EU ) recommendation evaluation immunogenicity new formulation license flu vaccine ( CPMP/BWP/214/96 ) . Besides , vaccine safety also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Immune Response Influenza Vaccination Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant female age ≥ 18 year old . 2 . Subject pregnant least 3 month , inclusive . 3 . Subject willing able adhere visit schedule study requirement . 4 . Subject read sign studyspecific inform consent . 1 . Subject previous complicate pregnancy preterm delivery , spontaneous medical abortion ; 2 . Subject history concurrent high risk dangerous gestation gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) , pregnant induced hypertension , preeclampsia ; 3 . Subject receive influenza vaccine within previous 6 month ; 4 . Subject history hypersensitivity egg egg protein similar pharmacological effect study vaccine ; 5 . Subject family history GuillainBarré Syndrome ; 6 . Subject current upper respiratory illness ( URI ) , include common cold nasal congestion within 72 hour ; 7 . Subject influenzalike illness define presence fever ( temperature 38ºC ) least two follow four symptom : headache , muscle/joint ache pain ( e.g . myalgia/arthralgia ) , sore throat cough ; 8 . Subject receive treatment investigational drug device , participation clinical study , within 3 month consent ; 9 . Subject immunodeficiency immunosuppressive treatment . 10 . Subject receive vaccine within 1 week prior study vaccination expect receive one within 1 week study vaccination ; 11 . Subject receive blood product , include immunoglobulin , past 3 month consent ; 12 . Subject underlying condition investigator ' opinion may interfere evaluation vaccine ;
